recipe.title: Spinach And Feta Baked Egg Cups Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup ; baby spinach, roughly chopped ; (20 g)
¼ cup ; crumbled feta cheese ; (40 g)
¼ cup ; diced tomato, about half a Roma tomato ; (50 g)

steps.step: Spray a six-cup muffin tray with nonstick spray.
In a bowl, add the eggs, spinach, feta, tomato, salt, and pepper, and stir to distribute ingredients.
Distribute the mixture evenly between the muffins cups.
Bake until the eggs are set, about 15 minutes.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Spray a six-cup muffin tray with nonstick spray.
In a bowl, add the eggs, spinach, feta, tomato, salt, and pepper, and stir to distribute ingredients.
Distribute the mixture evenly between the muffins cups.
Bake until the eggs are set, about 15 minutes.
